list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: have on one's body or a part of one's body as clothing, decoration, protection, or for some other purpose.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was wearing a dark suit
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đang mặc một bộ đồ tối

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: damage, erode, or destroy by friction or use.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the track has been worn down in part to bare rock
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đường ray đã bị mòn một phần cho rock trần

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pass (a period of time) in some activity.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: spinning long stories, wearing half the day
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: quay truyện dài, mặc nửa ngày

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: bring (a ship) about by turning its head away from the wind.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Shannon gives the order to wear ship
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Shannon đưa ra thứ tự để mặc tàu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the wearing of something or the state of being worn as clothing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: some new tops for wear in the evening
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một số ngọn mới để mặc vào buổi tối

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: clothing suitable for a particular purpose or of a particular type.
damage or deterioration sustained from continuous use.
